document.topic_text: You are here: Home » Sports » Other Sports Sports legends questions IAO's decision Please enable the javascript of your browser to see the video. URL: Comment The appointment of actor Salman Khan as ambassador for the Indian contingent at the Rio Olympics has triggered a controversy. Wrestler Yogeshwar Dutt and Olympic legend Milkha Singh questioned Salman's appointment over other sporting stalwarts of the country.
